channel.title: I couldn't find a general convo page. So im going to use this one. I need help!
channel.description:
Im trying to get into college, which as we all know is super expensive! This is why im applying to every scholarship I can. If you guys could vote for my essay on this site, it would literally make my life. Thanks guys, Im hoping the internet can really come through for me on this one.
[url]https://www.wyzant.com/scholarships/v2/essay55752-Merrimack-NH.aspx[/url]

item.title: I couldn't find a general convo page. So im going to use this one. I need help!
item.dc:creator: CygNuS
item.description:
If it means that much to you, you really should have re-read your piece and gotten rid of that blatant error first:

“No one is the same, and everyone has there own beat.”

Really? I’m not even English, but that one bothers me everytime i see it

I voted anyway, for the effort

Read full topic
